Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT value(sum(T2.VAL_OPERACAO)0)
FROM seguros.v0mestsini
 
where
      t1.num_apolice       =  :NUM_APOLICE
  and t1.num_apol_sinistro =  t2.num_apol_sinistro
  and t1.situacao         <>  '2'
  and t2.situacao         <>  '2'
  and t2.operacao in (101,102,103,104,112,113,114,122,123,1050)
/ END SQL
